name: imageScaleTofit
description: Creates a resized image with the aspect ratio maintained.

params.name: name
params.description: The ColdFusion image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: fitWidth
params.description: The width of the bounding box in pixels. You can specify an integer, or an empty string ('') if the fitHeight is specified.

params.name: fitHeight
params.description: The height of the bounding box in pixels. You can specify an integer, or an empty string ('') if the fitWidth is specified.

params.name: interpolation
params.description: The interpolation method for resampling. You can specify a specific interpolation algorithm by name (for example, hamming), by image quality (for example, mediumQuality), or by performance (for example, highestPerformance).

params.name: blurfactor
params.description: The blur factor used for resampling. The higher the blur factor, the more blurred the image (also, the longer it takes to resize the image).

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to resize an image to fit a 100x100-pixel square while maintaining the aspect ratio.
examples.code:
<!--- Create a ColdFusion image from an existing JPEG file. ---> 
 <cfimage source="../cfdocs/images/artgallery/jeff05.jpg" name="myImage"> 
 <!--- Turn on antialiasing to improve image quality. ---> 
 <cfset imageSetAntialiasing(myImage,"on")> 
 <cfset imageScaleTofit(myImage,100,"","lanczos")> 
 <!--- Display the modified image in a browser. ---> 
 <cfimage source="#myImage#" action="writeToBrowser">

examples.title: Using scaleTofit member function
examples.description: CF11+ Scale to fit an image to half its original size (71,71)
